mapper.select: SELECT p.id_Pgm, p.id_Cate, p.id_Room, p.id_Prof, p.pgm_Name, p.st_Dt, p.end_Dt, p.sugang_St_Dt, p.sugang_End_Dt, p.pgm_Target, p.pgm_Method, p.pgm_Per, p.pgm_Fee, c.cate_Name, r.room_Name, pr.name AS prof_Name FROM Program p JOIN Category c ON p.id_Cate = c.id_Cate JOIN class_room r ON p.id_Room = r.id_Room JOIN Professor pr ON p.id_Prof = pr.id_Prof;

SELECT p.id_Pgm, p.id_Cate, p.id_Room, p.id_Prof, p.pgm_Name, p.st_Dt, p.end_Dt, p.sugang_St_Dt, p.sugang_End_Dt, p.pgm_Target, p.pgm_Method, p.pgm_Per, p.pgm_Fee, c.cate_Name, r.room_Name, pr.name AS prof_Name FROM Program p JOIN Category c ON p.id_Cate = c.id_Cate JOIN class_room r ON p.id_Room = r.id_Room JOIN Professor pr ON p.id_Prof = pr.id_Prof WHERE p.id_Pgm = #{programId};
